description: Lists the knowledge bases in an account. The list also includes information about each knowledge base.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Enumerating knowledge bases reveals what enterprise data sources are connected to AI workloads and how they are configured.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.technique: T1530 - Data from Cloud Storage Object
unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: A list of knowledge bases can point attackers to valuable document stores or vector databases that might contain sensitive data.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListKnowledgeBases to identify connected data repositories and prioritize follow-on data theft or sabotage.
